column5: Hopefully you will see three pics.....me with pike and brookie from Quebec, and a French River muskie.....my first on a surface plug. Damn.....makes me want to go fishing!!    What the heck????  Still no pics......I did instructions in the FAQ section.......anyone else having trouble?
Can't see what you are doing as no code is showing...but keep trying and use the "preview" button to see it it works and then if it does hit the post message button.
